long_description: After an intense workout, recharge with the Hammer Nutrition Recovery bar. It's fortified with vitamins and minerals, and is a good source of calcium, magnesium and potassium. Use the bar as recovery fuel when you want solid food rather than a drink mix, or enjoy as an occasional snack to bolster your daily protein intake. Amino acids, including L-glutamine, L-arginine, L-leucine, L-valine and L-isoleucine, aid in recovery. Each bar contains 20g of protein and 8g of fiber. Peanut butter and chocolate combine to give the bar great flavor. Hammer Nutrition Recovery bar is gluten free and kosher; made with 70% organic ingredients and does not contain any genetically modified organisms. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: After an intense workout, recharge with the Hammer Nutrition Recovery bar. It's fortified with vitamins and minerals, and is a good source of calcium, magnesium and potassium.
